org.sindice.siren.analysis

Class TupleAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
      • org.sindice.siren.analysis.TupleAnalyzer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable
    Deprecated. 
    Use JsonAnalyzer instead

    @Deprecated
public class TupleAnalyzer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.Analyzer
    The TupleAnalyzer is especially designed to process RDF data. It applies various post-processing on URIs and Literals.
